requirements.summary: Create service booking system for lawn mowing and car washing services
acceptanceCriteria: Customers can select either lawn mowing or car washing service
Customers can submit a booking request with their details
Service requests are stored in the backend

file_operations.description: Create booking form component that allows customers to select service type (lawn mowing or car washing), enter their details, and submit booking requests. The form will call the backend createBooking method to store requests.
Create booking page that displays the BookingForm component and handles successful booking confirmations.
Add route for BookingPage and wire it into the application router so customers can navigate to the booking form.

requirements.summary: Implement booking form with customer details, service selection, date, and address
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes fields for name, email/phone, service selection, date picker, and address
Form validates required fields before submission
Users receive confirmation after successful booking

file_operations.description: Add form fields for customer name, email, phone, service type dropdown (lawn mowing or car washing), date picker, and address textarea. Implement validation for required fields and display confirmation message on successful submission using the backend createBooking method.
Create custom hook to manage booking form state, validation logic, and submission handling with backend integration.

requirements.summary: Display list of service bookings with filtering by service type and status
acceptanceCriteria: All bookings are displayed in a list or table format
Users can filter by lawn mowing or car washing services
Users can filter by booking status
Each booking shows customer details, service type, date, and current status

file_operations.description: Create bookings list component that displays all service bookings in a table format showing customer details, service type, date, address, and status. Fetch bookings using backend getAllBookings method.

Create filter component with dropdowns for service type (lawn mowing, car washing, all) and booking status (pending, confirmed, completed, all). Use backend getBookingsByServiceType and getBookingsByStatus methods to fetch filtered results.
Create bookings management page that combines BookingFilters and BookingsList components to display and filter all service bookings.
Create custom hook to fetch and manage bookings data from backend, handle filtering logic, and provide state management for the bookings list.
Add route for BookingsManagementPage and wire navigation link in the app layout so users can access the bookings list.

acceptanceCriteria: Service providers can change booking status
Status updates persist in the backend
UI reflects status changes immediately

file_operations.description: Create status update component with dropdown or buttons to change booking status between pending, confirmed, and completed. Use backend updateBookingStatus method to persist changes.
Integrate BookingStatusUpdate component into each booking row to allow status changes directly from the list view. Update local state immediately after successful backend update.
Create custom hook to handle booking status updates, call backend updateBookingStatus method, and manage optimistic UI updates with error handling.

requirements.summary: Design professional theme with earthy greens and bright automotive blues
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme combines natural greens with clean blues
Typography is clear and professional
Layout is organized and easy to navigate
Design conveys trustworthiness and cleanliness

file_operations.description: Add custom color palette with earthy greens for lawn care elements and bright automotive blues for car wash elements. Define primary, secondary, and accent colors that combine both service themes professionally.
Apply custom theme colors to global styles, set professional typography with clear font families and sizes, and establish consistent spacing and layout patterns for organized navigation.
Create layout component with professional header, navigation menu, and footer that uses the custom theme colors and provides organized structure for all pages.
Wrap all routes with Layout component to apply consistent theme and navigation across the application.

requirements.summary: Display generated images as static assets including service icons and hero banner
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored in frontend/public/assets/generated
Images are properly referenced in components
Images load correctly in the application

file_operations.description: Create hero section component that displays the generated hero banner image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png with welcoming text introducing the service booking platform.

Create service card component that displays service type with corresponding icon. Use frontend/public/assets/generated/lawn-mower-icon.dim_128x128.png for lawn mowing and frontend/public/assets/generated/car-wash-icon.dim_128x128.png for car washing services.
Add HeroSection component at the top of the booking page and display ServiceCard components to visually represent the two available services using the generated icons.
